title: Bar Timer
content:
Bar Timer is a technical indicator which shows time remaining before candle closes.

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.


Indicator's settings

Time settings

NameDescription
Time format Defines the time display format.

Options:
  • Auto
  • hh:mm:ss
  • h:mm:ss am/pm
  • mm:ss
Mode Determines what time information is displayed.

Options:
  • Time until bar closes
  • Current time
Time Zone Allows you to set a custom time zone to correct time.

Settings

NameDescription
OffsetX Sets the x-axis offset of the label in pixels.
Offset Y Sets the y-axis offset of the label in pixels.
Size Sets the font size.
Location Specifies the display location of the label.

Options:
  • Top left
  • Top right
  • Bottom left
  • Bottom right

Colors

NameDescription
Color Sets the color of the label text.
Background Sets the background color of the label.

Alert on new candle

NameDescription
Use alerts Enables or disables the sound notification.
Alert File This parameter allows users to specify the name of a custom audio file for alert sounds. Users can select a WAV file that will be played whenever an alert condition is triggered. The chosen WAV file should be located in the folder C:\Program Files (x86)\ATAS Platform\Sounds.
Text Color Sets the color of the text in the alert window.
Area Color Sets the background color of the alert window.

Change color before new candle

NameDescription
Use alerts Enables or disables a sound notification a certain number of seconds before a new main alert appears.
Alert File Specifies the sound file for the notification before the main alert.
Seconds Sets the number of seconds before a new alert appears.
Show area Enables or disables highlighting of the displayed element during an alert.
Area Color Sets the background color of the label.
Text Color Sets the color of the label text.
